Title: Dracthyr Down
Description:
What was done to Marithos goes beyond what simple healing can fix. If we expect him to fly out of here, he will need extra care.

Thankfully, there are herbs nearby that may give his healing a boost--enough to get him standing, anyway.

Look around and collect some of the Wingfoil nearby, $n.
ObjectivesText: Look for Wingfoil herbs in the Lonely Falls.
